overview: Kapal has a habit of predicting the fortunes and the thoughts of people. When he meets Jasmine, he tries to predict her future and he tells her that she will lose her fianc√©. When it becomes true, Jasmine insists that Kapal take responsibility for the ill prediction and wants him to find her a new love within two weeks. When the two weeks are up, it is also the night when the Planet Mars can been seen with the naked eye, a phenomenon every 800 years. Kapal then uses this moment to offer eternal love to Jasmine, just as the Planet Mars loyally returns to its closest spot to earth (56 million Kilometers away) every 800 years.
title: Planet Mars
